articles.author: Ishaan Tharoor
articles.title: Column | In embrace of ‘remigration,’ Trump echoes Europe’s far right - The Washington Post
articles.description: The term “remigration” probably entered President Donald Trump’s orbit via the politics of ascendant far-right parties in Germany and Austria.
articles.content: In President Donald Trumps first term, we got used to hearing dog whistles. Trumps populist nationalism was riven through by messaging that implicitly demonized minorities and migrants. Undocumented … [+358 chars]
